name: Ciggie Simulator
description:
You are a volunteer who is testing a new kind of cigarette from an unbranded manufacturer. They claim their ciggies are 100% health-risk free. You will be smoking 3 cigarettes from 4 different strengths for 4 days. What could possibly go wrong?

*Complete the game to unlock free play!*

There are 2 endings.

Controls:

[LMB] Pick up Light & Ciggie / Smoke

*Any other controls will be shown in-game.*
